content.p: If you need a visa to study at the University, our dedicated visas and immigration team is here to help. Use our visa guidance webpages to plan and prepare your UK visa application, and understand your responsibilities. If you can't find the answers to your visa questions, or you need more guidance, contact our immigration advisers. Contact an immigration adviser Our immigration sponsor licence number is RFDX42DB2 and our ACL code for BRP collection is 2HE427.
